data.eml:eml: Deep phylogenetic divergence between Scolytoplatypus and Remansus, a new genus of Scolytoplatypodini from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Scolytinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jordal, Bjarte H. (2013): Deep phylogenetic divergence between Scolytoplatypus and Remansus, a new genus of Scolytoplatypodini from Madagascar (Coleoptera, Curculionidae, Scolytinae). ZooKeys 352: 9-33, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.352.6212, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.352.6212
